text: Arau sihamtara majata enekuraa manuho ache yisakale nabika kasta diye arau kaya, ‘e'omto karnapatakarai’. Koraa, ‘tomalokara babe yi mangala te'om kerala seya'i sune’. Te'om allahara oparata bisbasa karae arau muminasakalako bisbasa karae; arau tomalokara majata yisakala imandara te'om sihamtara babe rahamata. Arau yisakale allahara raachulaka sasti diye sihamtara babe ache yantranadayaka sasti
